content.value: Hey men! When you see a tweet thread like this and you want to write a woman off as a man hater, first ask yourself, "What could have happened to her that made her feel such distrust toward men?" Then re-read her tweets and you'll find the answers. #BelieveWomen #DoBetterBeBetter
